# Not-Fraunhofer-IAF
An unofficial Fraunhofer IAF–style presentation template for Typst, built on top of diatypst.
Please support [Marten](https://github.com/skriptum).
This is also not an official Fraunhofer resource—just a quick project created for convenience when preparing presentations in Typst.

Download the Fonts from: http://fonts3.com/search/?/Frutiger-LT-Com/
